description: Large elephants are depicted engaging in activities typically reserved for humans, such as swinging on a swing set and sliding down a slide. Two explorers, hidden amongst large leaves, react with astonishment upon witnessing this scene. The humor stems from the surreal image of wild animals using playground equipment. This unexpected behavior is treated by the explorers as a significant, hidden natural phenomenon.
caption: “By Jove! We’ve found it, Simmons! ... The Secret Elephant Playground!”
